item.title: How to fool reviewers with machine learning
About Me
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I am a data & research scientist, algorithm developer, and biomedical & neural engineer. I have 10+ years of experiences in developing brain-computer interfaces and its real-world & clinical applications. My goal is to leverage my skills including research design and data analysis to make the world healthier! This blog is my memorandum of what I have learned through my research activities. Good results are published as academic papers, while negative results are usually discarded and forgotten.
